eu.fbk.dkm.springles.base

Class SynchronizedTransaction.Watchdog

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.fbk.dkm.springles.base.SynchronizedTransaction.Watchdog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    SynchronizedTransaction

    private class SynchronizedTransaction.Watchdog
extends Object
implements Runnable
    Helper class supporting the enforcement of the maximum transaction execution and idle times.

    When a SynchronizedTransaction is created suppling maximum execution and idle times, an instance of this class is registered with the supplied scheduler to be executed (being a Runnable) periodically. Every time it invoked, method run() checks whether the maximum execution and idle time have expired: if it is the case, the transaction is rolled back. In order to track idle time, method touch() has to be called each time the transaction is busy in an operation, so to update the last activity timestamp.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ScheduledFuture<?> future
      A future object used to unregister the watchdog from the scheduler.
      private long idleTime
      The transaction last activity timestamp, in ms.
      private long maxExecutionTime
      The configured maximum execution time, in ms.
      private long maxIdleTime
      The configured maximum idle time, in ms.
      private long startTime
      The transaction start timestamp, in ms.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SynchronizedTransaction.Watchdog(long maxExecutionTime, long maxIdleTime, ScheduledExecutorService scheduler)
      Creates a new instance for the maximum times specified, and register it with the supplied scheduler.

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      This method is executed periodically and terminates the transaction if timeout is detected.

      Checks whether the transaction time out, w.r.t.

                                long maxIdleTime,
                                ScheduledExecutorService scheduler)
        Creates a new instance for the maximum times specified, and register it with the supplied scheduler.
        Parameters:
        maxExecutionTime - the maximum transaction execution time, in ms
        maxIdleTime - the maximum transaction idle time, in ms
